LanguageData.Yokai_Nabe.label: Yokai cooking pot
LanguageData.Yokai_Nabe.description: Special fuel is required to ignite the fire in this Yokai cooking table. A ward keeps the fire from igniting any other way, as all Yokai recipes require a peculiar flame to cook properly.

LanguageData.Yokai_Hariko.label: Yokai tailoring bench
LanguageData.Yokai_Hariko.description: This special sewing machine does not require electricity to use; instead, one must make or attain a certain kind of fuel from Yokai traders. Besides clothes, this bench is used to create Yokai medicine.

LanguageData.Yokai_Kanatoko.description: A tender but fierce magic guides the flame within this forge, thus it can create anything from army annihilating weapons to intricately crafted prosthetics.
